name: io.github.qiskit/qiskit-ibm-runtime-mcp-server
title: Qiskit IBM Runtime MCP Server
description: MCP server for IBM Quantum computing services through Qiskit IBM Runtime

environmentVariables.name: QISKIT_IBM_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Your IBM Quantum API token for authentication

environmentVariables.name: QISKIT_IBM_RUNTIME_MCP_INSTANCE
environmentVariables.description: IBM Quantum instance CRN for faster startup (skips instance lookup)
